Application.Controller

Class InDepthController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.InDepthController

  • @SessionAttributes(value={"scenarioId","goToInDepth"})
 @Controller
public class InDepthController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing the In-depth Match(es). When a User played a Match, they can choose whether to play the In-depth version of such Match. In the In-depth Match the User is asked for their opinion on the Vision of the challenger.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getMatch

        @RequestMapping(value="/in-depth",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String getMatch(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                       @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                       java.lang.String user_id)
        Returns the page containing the Vision of the challenger, with all its details.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        Returns:
        "indepth" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • saveInDepthMatch

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveThoughts",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String saveInDepthMatch(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                             @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="match")
                                                                                                             Match match,
                                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="button-pressed-indepth")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String buttonPressed,
                                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                             int scenarioId)
        Saves the thoughts of the User who played the In-depth Match.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        match - The Quick Match played by the User.
        buttonPressed - The input received by the front-end when the "Submit" button is pressed.
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client. Possible return strings:
        • "redirect:/feelings"
        • "redirect:/error"
        • "redirect:/match"
